lead_paragraph: The On Par column on Monday, about strategies for avoiding golf injuries, misstated a medical credential of Dr. Vijay Vad, a physician at the Hospital for Special Surgery in Manhattan who studied PGA Tour players with bad backs. He is a sports medicine specialist, not an orthopedist.
